projects.title: MerlinDoc
projects.desc: Medical Directory App built with MERN stack. User can search a list of doctors based on the chosen state. There is an autocomplete feature & redux store is persisted if user refresh their browser.

projects.title: MerlinStore Client
projects.desc: Front-end for MerlinStore Client is built with React & Redux, and in the back-end there is a REST API built with Express & MongoDB. CRUD operations are completed.

projects.title: MerlinDash
projects.desc: Concept Website for Push Notifications App built with ReactJS. Designed for the large screen.
